name: Decay (Marion0401, Lena, pjdevs, Zaksley, Bedjes-Studio)
description:
An ARCTIS game for the 2022 UQAC WONDERJAM,
7-9 oct. 2022

« It's not a glitch, it's a feature »

Mandatory styles (3/3) :

- Co-op
- Turn-Based
- Progression

A perfectly fine and normal platformer which will be a delight for young and old.

Play with Rem and help him pick up th3!e key§s to 0/:/%scap;9e the Zip*1tzes.v.

Keybinds : 

- Z,Q,S,D and Space. 
- A to switch between REM and the developer
Warning: ESC closes the game !

Windows 10 HD Screen (1920x1080) minimum

You can play in your broswer but your frame rate might be impacted. If so, download the Windows version!

ALL THE VISUAL ASSETS WERE ENTIRELY HAND-MADE DURING THE JAM.

- Léna Herau
- Enzo Medina
- Pierre-Jean Morel
- Hugo Langlais
- Come Serlooten
- Marion Trassaert

Special thanks to:

- The 2022 UQAC Wonderjam team for organizing the event
- The tabletop genre for no reason
